nodes.text: The Haldeen sector, or Findris sector, was in the Colonies, between the Glythe sector and the Kokash sector. It bordered the Barma sector. Planets in the sector included Haldeen, itself, and Argai Minor.
It was part of the Galactic Republic and later the Galactic Empire, and governed by Moff Gandril.

Outbound Flight and The Complete Star Wars Encyclopedia places Argai in Haldeen sector. These contradict all other sources, which place Argai in the Tion Cluster in the Outer Rim Territories. This was corrected in the The Essential Atlas which creates Argai Minor and places it the Haldeen sector.
